reviews.title: Awesome App
reviews.comment: This app does what it says it repairs files and erases your history.  Phone works better. I have Motorola M Electrify 4G lite.  My phone is a dream to own.
reviews.author: debra smessaert

reviews.title: phone is lagging since
reviews.comment: i dont know is because of it or not. since i did my defrage some icones changed position on my android sandwish where i had to put hem back where used to be and it start lagging bbig time...

reviews.title: Conflicting information.

reviews.title: Spamware
reviews.comment: Works great.  Unfortunately, it\'s reduced to 1 star by notification ads.  Why do these developers really think we appreciate them buzzing our pockets with their ads?  Anyone who receives one of these notification ads is going to be instantly furious, and if it happens more than once they\'ll install your app.
reviews.author: Ivan Grantham

reviews.title: Does the job
reviews.comment: This app seems to work pretty well. Simple to use and helps my Xperia J to run smoothly with less lag. I took a point off as it\'s quite slow.
reviews.author: Jockie Fraser

reviews.title: Scam
reviews.comment: It shows 12 deleted files and 61 fixed.. on both internal/external..does nothing except make ad money for dev.  ..also read description of 4 other apps from different dev. All exact same wording..  scammer!
reviews.author: David Smith

reviews.title: So far...so good
reviews.comment: Samsung Galaxy SIII. It performs as it is described. First scan and defrag without any complications, if this leads to an improvement in responce times I will alter my grading upwards and purchase the paid version.
